verses.roman:
eta bali' punaḥ tāṅre kailā āliṅgana
kaṇḍu gela, aṅga haila suvarṇera sama

synonyms: eta bali'-saying this; punaḥ—again; tāṅre—him; kailā—did; āliṅgana—embracing; kaṇḍu gela—the itching sores disappeared; aṅga—the body; haila—became; suvarṇera sama—like gold.
translation: After saying this, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu again embraced Sanātana Gosvāmī. Thus immediately Sanātana's itches disappeared, and his entire body resembled the color of gold.
